topics.body:
I'd still be concerned for her, but now I'm angry because people are mocking her pain.

I was in the ER myself about a month ago, and I hurt myself pretty bad. Except I didn't twist an ankle, but I bashed my head open and had to get staples for my injuries. Damn well nearly got a concussion and lost a lot of blood that day.

Except I have no idea how she did that to herself, but I fucked up that day goofing around and being careless. Next thing I know, I'm slamming myself against the roof of the doorframe of my bedroom door, and I find myself bleeding out in pain and dazed. Thank god my dad and cousin came to my aid ASAP, or I'd be even more fucked up than I already way.
